tool_description: Optimizes delivery routes using advanced algorithms to minimize travel time, distance, and fuel consumption while respecting constraints.

distance_matrix.description: Flattened distance matrix between all locations

time_matrix.description: Flattened travel time matrix between all locations

optimization_objective.description: Optimization goal: minimize_distance, minimize_time, minimize_vehicles, balanced

max_vehicle_count.description: Maximum number of vehicles to use

error_messages: Coordinate array mismatch: Delivery latitude and longitude arrays must have equal lengths.
Matrix size mismatch: Distance and time matrices must match the number of locations.
Invalid optimization objective: Use one of [minimize_distance, minimize_time, minimize_vehicles, balanced].
Insufficient vehicles: Increase max_vehicle_count to handle all deliveries within time constraints.
Priority weights mismatch: Priority weights array must match the number of deliveries if provided.
usage: Provide depot location, delivery coordinates, distance/time matrices, and optimization parameters. Returns optimized routes with vehicle assignments.

optimized_routes.description: Sequence of delivery locations for each route

vehicle_assignments.description: Vehicle IDs assigned to each route

total_distance.description: Total distance across all routes in kilometers

total_duration.description: Total travel time across all routes in minutes
